text:
Blake Shelton BURNS Luke Bryan for Offering to Officiate His and Gwen’s Potential Wedding

This is why I absolutely LOVE Blake Shelton! Not only does he burn Adam Levine all the time, but now he’s throwing it Luke Bryan’s way!

By Pacey on April 25, 2018

This is why I absolutely LOVE Blake Shelton! Not only does he burn Adam Levine all the time, but now he’s throwing it Luke Bryan’s way! If you didn’t see, during a red carpet interview at the ACMs Luke Bryan was asked if he would officiate Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton’s wedding if they end up getting married, and he said gladly. Watch Blake Shelton’s reaction below:
title: Blake Shelton BURNS Luke Bryan for Offering to Officiate His and Gwen’s Potential Wedding
